name: Fireball Factory (GB Studio)
description:
A minigame for GameBoy created with GB Studio.

Story

There's a foreign country that earns a lot of money by producing fireballs. Let's get an insight into the production process – it is not as easy as it sounds first!

Collect stars, jump from gear to gear, bounce on walls and slide through pipes. Once you collect all the stars, you finish the game. So, it is not a big deal, isn't it? Well, you only have a limited number of jumps, so it might be tricky!

Tell me in the comments if you managed to complete the game.

Controls

A – show stats, select menu items (Z or Y on desktop)
B – jump (X on desktop)
LEFT or RIGHT – turn gear (A or LEFT / D or RIGHT on desktop)

Do you want more of this?

This game is a presentation of the great possibilities that can be achieved by using the amazing free game creation tool called GB Studio – even if it is not a top-view/RPG game!

This is a preview of a game that is WIP. Please consider donating a few bucks if you want to see more levels and features.
